cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 6th Jan 2026 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 6th Jan 2026 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Comfortable made single bed with wardrobe a heater and towel. Shared bathrooms and kitchen facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Small room has a double sized bed with hand basin, towels and a heater. Shared bathrooms and kitchen facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Room with made queen size bed hand basin, heater, towels. Shared bathrooms and kitchen facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Small room with one made double sized bed hand basin in room towels and wall heater. This room has a small en-suite ( private shower and toilet )

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only

privates.name: 4 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Family room for four has one single bed and a double bed bunk (double on bottom and a single above) all bed linen provided also towels, wall heater. Shared bathrooms and kitchen facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: 4 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Family room for four the room has two wooden bunk beds bed linen provided also towels. There is a sink/hand basin and a wall heater. Shared bathrooms and kitchen facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
